info.name: ReadonlyREST - ELK test
info.description:
1. Logstash createst templates and puts events + Kibana .index
2. Kibana daemon creates the .kibana index
3. Kibana RO+ sets up the index pattern
4. Kibana RO+ creates a viz
5. Kibana RO+ creates a dashboard with the viz
6. Kibana RO views the viz
7. Kiban RO changes the timeframe

item.name: [KIBANA RO+] write field of logstash-* in .kibana

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_11_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/53.0.2785.143 Safari/537.36

item.name: [KIBANA RO+] get indices for index pattern logstash-*
[KIBANA RO+] get the viz to add
[KIBANA RO+] get the logstash-* index pattern  fields
[KIBANA RO] pull data from index pattern logstash-*
[KIBANA RO] get all the dashboards from .kibana
[KIBANA RO] CANNOT write index pattern property
[KIBANA RO] CANNOT create generic dashboard mapping
